law.catch_line: Rate of insured unemployment -- Regular, extended, and additional benefits -- Eligibility period -- Exhaustee.
law.history: Amended 2010 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 3, effective August 28, 2010. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 67, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 385, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 1; and ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(2). --Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 9.
